metadata.title: CVE-2024-32624 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: HDF5 Library through 1.14.3 contains a heap-based buffer overflow inH5T__ref_mem_setnull in H5Tref.c (called from H5T__conv_ref in H5Tconv.c),resulting in the corruption of the instruction pointer.

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
